noun.description: A pair of briefs consisting of small panels connected by strings at the sides.

proper noun.description: One of the principal ports of Tanzania, situated in the northeast of the country, on the Indian Ocean; population 240,000 (est. 2009).

origin: Early 20th century (denoting a loincloth worn by indigenous peoples in tropical America): from Portuguese, ultimately of Bantu origin. The current sense dates from the 1970s.
